section.p:
You tell the priestess you
no longer wish to be an initiate . She utters a long weary sigh and throws her head back in the slumbrous heat. ‘Go then.’
‘Do I not have to pay compensation? That is customary.’
‘Not here in the tropics. Every exertion only makes a pool for flies to paddle in. I cannot be bothered to rise from my divan to open the strongbox. Now, begone.’
